data.name: sqlDataSource3.SelectCommand
data.value: SELECT Classroom.ClassroomName, Classroom.ClassroomID FROM Classroom INNER JOIN Users AS U ON U.UserID = @userID INNER JOIN TempM101 ON TempM101.ClassroomID = Classroom.ClassroomID and TempM101.SchoolID = U.SchoolID and TempM101.UserID = @userID WHERE Classroom.SchoolID = U.SchoolID and Classroom.Period = U.UserPeriod ORDER BY Classroom.SortOrder, Classroom.ClassroomName ASC

data.name: textBox52.Value
data.value: = Sum(Fields.CashPayment + Fields.Fee01 + Fields.Fee02 + Fields.Fee03 + Fields.Fee04 + Fields.Fee05 + Fields.Fee06 + Fields.Fee07 + Fields.Fee08)

data.name: textBox106.Value
data.value: = Sum(Fields.CashPayment + Fields.Fee01Collection + Fields.Fee02Collection + Fields.Fee03Collection + Fields.Fee04Collection + Fields.Fee05Collection + Fields.Fee06Collection + Fields.Fee07Collection + Fields.Fee08Collection)

data.name: textBox110.Value
data.value: = Sum(Fields.CashPayment + Fields.Fee01 + Fields.Fee02 + Fields.Fee03 + Fields.Fee04 + Fields.Fee05 + Fields.Fee06 + Fields.Fee07 + Fields.Fee08) - Sum(Fields.CashPayment + Fields.Fee01Collection + Fields.Fee02Collection + Fields.Fee03Collection + Fields.Fee04Collection + Fields.Fee05Collection + Fields.Fee06Collection + Fields.Fee07Collection + Fields.Fee08Collection)

data.name: textBox104.Value
data.value: = Sum(Fields.CashPayment + Fields.Fee01 + Fields.Fee02 + Fields.Fee03 + Fields.Fee04 + Fields.Fee05 + Fields.Fee06 + Fields.Fee07 + Fields.Fee08)

data.name: textBox63.Value
data.value: = Sum(Fields.CashPayment + Fields.Fee01Collection + Fields.Fee02Collection + Fields.Fee03Collection + Fields.Fee04Collection + Fields.Fee05Collection + Fields.Fee06Collection + Fields.Fee07Collection + Fields.Fee08Collection)

data.name: textBox107.Value
data.value: = Sum(Fields.CashPayment + Fields.Fee01 + Fields.Fee02 + Fields.Fee03 + Fields.Fee04 + Fields.Fee05 + Fields.Fee06 + Fields.Fee07 + Fields.Fee08) - Sum(Fields.CashPayment + Fields.Fee01Collection + Fields.Fee02Collection + Fields.Fee03Collection + Fields.Fee04Collection + Fields.Fee05Collection + Fields.Fee06Collection + Fields.Fee07Collection + Fields.Fee08Collection)

data.name: sqlDataSource1.SelectCommand
data.value: SELECT format(DateOfRegistration, 'yyyy MM'), sum(CashPayment) as CashPayment, sum(RefundAmount) as RefundAmount, sum(CancelAmount) as CancelAmount, sum(Fee01) as Fee01, sum(Fee02) as Fee02, sum(Fee03) as Fee03, sum(Fee04) as Fee04, sum(Fee05) as Fee05, sum(Fee06) as Fee06, sum(Fee07) as Fee07, sum(Fee08) as Fee08, sum(Fee01Collection) as Fee01Collection, sum(Fee02Collection) as Fee02Collection, sum(Fee03Collection) as Fee03Collection, sum(Fee04Collection) as Fee04Collection, sum(Fee05Collection) as Fee05Collection, sum(Fee06Collection) as Fee06Collection, sum(Fee07Collection) as Fee07Collection, sum(Fee08Collection) as Fee08Collection, sum(Fee01Balance) as Fee01Balance, sum(Fee02Balance) as Fee02Balance, sum(Fee03Balance) as Fee03Balance, sum(Fee04Balance) as Fee04Balance, sum(Fee05Balance) as Fee05Balance, sum(Fee06Balance) as Fee06Balance, sum(Fee07Balance) as Fee07Balance, sum(Fee08Balance) as Fee08Balance, TempM101Header.HeaderFee01, TempM101Header.HeaderFee02, TempM101Header.HeaderFee03, TempM101Header.HeaderFee04, TempM101Header.HeaderFee05, TempM101Header.HeaderFee06, TempM101Header.HeaderFee07, TempM101Header.HeaderFee08, TempM101Header.HeaderFee09, TempM101Header.HeaderFee10 FROM TempM101 INNER JOIN Users AS U ON U.UserID = @userID INNER JOIN TempM101Header ON TempM101Header.SchoolID = U.SchoolID and TempM101Header.UserID = @userID WHERE TempM101.SchoolID = U.SchoolID and TempM101.UserID = @userID and DateOfRegistration IS NOT NULL group by format(DateOfRegistration, 'yyyy MM'), TempM101Header.HeaderFee01, TempM101Header.HeaderFee02, TempM101Header.HeaderFee03, TempM101Header.HeaderFee04, TempM101Header.HeaderFee05, TempM101Header.HeaderFee06, TempM101Header.HeaderFee07, TempM101Header.HeaderFee08, TempM101Header.HeaderFee09, TempM101Header.HeaderFee10 ORDER BY format(DateOfRegistration, 'yyyy MM') ASC

data.name: sqlDataSource2.SelectCommand
data.value: SELECT S.CompanyName, S.CompanyAddress, S.Phone1, S.Phone2, S.MobilePhone, S.Fax, S.TaxOffice, S.TaxNo, S.CompanyEmail, S.WebSite, U.UserPeriod FROM SchoolInfo AS S INNER JOIN Users AS U ON U.UserID = @userID WHERE S.SchoolID = U.SchoolID
